Text: Great patch... It improved my performance much :P But i have one problem. When i play I'm thrown out of the game into the Menu for no reason. I haven't done anything, i was just driving when this happens, so i have to start all over. Do somebody know why or have a fix? :P
I installed this patch and it worked well. But my keyboard stopped working. Could someone tell me what might cause it?!?
Naxell, I'm having the same problem, I'll let you know if I find a fix.  It sounds like the crack is no longer working...

@Naxell and others, I found the solution to the problem of the game throwing you to the main menu after 30 seconds: You must delete your profile and make a new one :(

Your profile is the folder called "2988734" or whatever numbers it is for you.  It is found in this directory:
%userprofile%DocumentsSCANIA Truck Driving Simulatorprofile

Delete it, move it somewhere else, just get rid of it.  Then start Scania, make a new profile, and now you get to have all the fun of setting up all your options again, and then losing all your saved games and progress!  YAY!

unfortunately, it's worked only for few first missions :( now it's throwing me to the main menu again
